name: In re Nomination Papers of Joseph A. DIORIO, Representing the Independent Body, Candidate for Senator of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania for the 5th Senatorial District, Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of James R. LLOYD, Jr.
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Papers of Diorio

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN,- ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Papers of Joseph A. DIORIO, Representing the Independent Body, Candidate for Senator of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania for the 5th Senatorial District, Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of James R. LLOYD, Jr.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John Bernard McNally, Joseph H. O’Donnell, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gary M. Gusoff, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
398 A.2d 658
In re Nomination Papers of Joseph A. DIORIO, Representing the Independent Body, Candidate for Senator of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania for the 5th Senatorial District, Philadelphia County, Pennsylvania. Appeal of James R. LLOYD, Jr.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1979.
Decided March 16, 1979.
John Bernard McNally, Joseph H. O’Donnell, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gary M. Gusoff, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN,- ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
